hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
test "`sw_vers -productVersion`" == 10.7.5 || ( echo OS X builds need to be built on OS X 10.7.5 false )
# This shouldn't really be here, but it works PATH=/usr/local/git/bin:/usr/local/share/npm/bin:/usr/local/bin:$PATH
test -d .git || ( git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/rethinkdb/rethinkdb.git )
git fetch origin --tags $GIT_REF git checkout -f FETCH_HEAD
# Clean any artifacts from previous builds git clean -fxd
./configure --static all --dynamic termcap termcap=-lncurses --fetch v8 --fetch protobuf --fetch protoc --fetch npm make build-osx BUILD_PORTABLE=1 ALLOW_WARNINGS=1
# rename the dmg VER="`scripts/gen-version.sh`" mv build/packages/osx/rethinkdb.dmg rethinkdb-"$VER".dmg
# Create zip of build results and files needed for test # tar czf build_output.tar.gz build/release/rethinkdb build/release/ build/drivers drivers
